name: Proof 377 — Fueling the Water Pump at 11:08
description:
On December 23, 2025 at 11:08 ICT, MaMee refuels the water pump used in MaMeeFarm.
No automation. No backup system. No external support.

Water in this farm does not come from infrastructure 
it comes from fuel, effort, and constant attention.

This act is not maintenance for convenience,
but a requirement for survival in a system where continuity depends entirely on human action.

Recorded as Ground Truth under the DGCP framework.

DGCP Classification

Proof-of-Work

Proof-of-Infrastructure

Proof-of-Continuity

DGCP | MMFARM-POL-2025
